spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Arrid's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell prismatic wall} (Two Walls appear for each color)

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: Arrid's weapon attacks are magical. When Arrid uses any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 8d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Anger of a Gentle Soul
entries: If Arrid sees an ally reduced to 0 hit points, he gains a +20 bonus to his melee damage against the aggressor until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Arrid knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Golden Wings
entries: Arrid regenerates 30 hit points at the start of his turns.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Arrid fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Arrid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Solar Sight
entries: Arrid gains a +5 bonus to his Perception skill.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Arrid makes two attacks with his Golden Tower Shield.

action.name: Golden Tower Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Shockwave
entries: Arrid slams the ground with his shield releasing a shockwave of energy in a 30 feet radius around him. Every creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 51 ({@damage 8d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} until the end of Arrid's next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and not be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} on a successful one.

action.name: Merciful Execution {@recharge 5}
entries: Arrid attempts to execute a creature with his divine energy within his melee range. If the creature he chooses has 150 hit points or fewer, it dies. If Arrid does not want to kill the creature, they take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (5/Day)
entries: Arrid touches another creature. The target magically regains 100 ({@dice 20d8 + 10}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

action.name: Gentle Wrath (1/Day)
entries: Arrid throws an extremely powerful punch towards a creature within 5 feet of him. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 62 ({@damage 10d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 54 ({@damage 12d8}) radiant damage on a failed save or no damage on a succesful one. If the creature fails their saving throw, they are vulnerable to all of Arrid's attacks for 24 hours.

Arrid can take 4 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Arrid regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Arrid magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 150 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Honed Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Arrid emits his magical, and honed divine energy.

Each creature of his choice in a 60-foot radius around him must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not be {@condition blinded} on a successful one.

legendary.name: Divine Shockwave (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: Arrid charges his shield with divine energy and does a Shockwave attack dealing an extra 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage.
